page.title: 15TRADE:Vehicle sales,Services
page.content: Four garages in the area are Walshaw Road Service Station, Elton Garage, Commercial Vehicle Repairs and Tottington Motors. {Walshaw Road Service Station}is a small garage, which sells Fina petrol, and repairs cars.It is open five days a week, it is twenty years old and employs three workers. {Elton Garage}provides a vehicle repair service, sells new Toyota and secondhand cars,there is a shop which sells various items and car parts. {Commercial Vehicle Repairs}is a small garage.They specialize in parts for all different vehicles.{Tottington {Motors} is part of a chain of garages including Bolton and Garstang.They sell new and second hand cars.They repair about 30 cars every week.There are 16 staff.They keep about 25 new cars and 50 secondhand.
